EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1330442774.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1330442774.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Lenard, If you are a part of our Exec model then we can hold you clearance but we would not be able to pay you on a 1099 like you are used to. Our Exec model is an alternative to self incorporation that offers you the ability to plug you consulting business into our corporate infrastructure. I believe you and Emily spoke about this a few weeks ago and in her notes it mentioned that you have your own S-Corp. If this is the case and you want to continue running all of your business through the S-Corp we would not be able to hold a clearance for you. If you would like to have a brief conversation to help me understand possible scenarios you are looking at I would be happy to do so. Have a great day!Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: <bbentley@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: optech@charter.net [mailto:optech@charter.net] Sent: Monday, February 27, 2012 5:51 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up Nicolette, I have been a sub contractor and/or a 1099 consultant for the last 7 years. The only service that I know I need is for someone to carry my security clearance and to have the contract vehicles for the government to pay me. Do you offer those services? Thanks,Lenard On Mon, Feb 27, 2012 at 3:14 PM, Nicolette Taylor wrote: Dear Lenard, I received your information from Emily Dyche and wanted to take a moment to reach out and introduce myself. She mentioned that while you will not be working through Booz Allen at this time, that you may be interested in utilizing our services for other consulting opportunities and wanted some additional information about our program. Ill be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdEFNsER%2By%2F%2BRI7v5mieOdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">going here. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
